meanings.definition: Not related to hearing or the sense of hearing.
meanings.sent1: The nonauditory experience was visual, not auditory.
meanings.sent2: The nonauditory activity focused on touch and sight.
meanings.sent3: The nonauditory puzzle game challenged players to use their sense of touch.
meanings.sent4: Her nonauditory art piece conveyed emotions through colors and shapes.
meanings.sent5: The nonauditory sensation of floating in water was calming and peaceful.

meanings.definition: Not involving or relating to the sense of hearing.
meanings.sent1: The nonauditory device helped people communicate through sign language.
meanings.sent2: The nonauditory performance captivated the audience with visuals.
meanings.sent3: The nonauditory movie had subtitles for viewers to follow the story.
meanings.sent4: His nonauditory painting spoke volumes without making a sound.
meanings.sent5: The nonauditory nature walk allowed visitors to appreciate the sights and smells of the forest.
